00002         AbstractTypes are abstract template objects initialized by INI files

00004 #ifndef ABSTRACTTYPE_H
00005 #define ABSTRACTTYPE_H

00007 #include <AbstractClass.h>

00009 //forward declarations
00010 class CCINIClass;
00011 
00012 //Macro for the static Array of every AbstractTypeClass!
00013 #define ABSTRACTTYPE_ARRAY(class_name)  public:\
00014         static DynamicVectorClass<class_name*>* Array;\
00015         static class_name* Find(const char* pID)\
00016         {\
00017                 for(int i = 0; i < Array->Count; ++i)\
00018                         if(!_strcmpi(Array->GetItem(i)->ID, pID))\
00019                                 return Array->GetItem(i);\
00020                 return NULL;\
00021         }\
00022         static class_name* FindOrAllocate(const char* pID)\
00023         {\
00024                 class_name* pRet = Find(pID);\
00025                 if(pRet)\
00026                         return pRet;\
00027                 else\
00028                         return new class_name(pID);\
00029         }\
00030         static int FindIndex(const char* pID)\
00031         {\
00032                 for(int i = 0; i < Array->Count; ++i)\
00033                         if(!_strcmpi(Array->GetItem(i)->ID, pID))\
00034                                 return i;\
00035                 return -1;\
00036         }
00037 //---
00038
